## FieldTextInput.doClassValidation\_() method

Ensure that the input value casts to a valid string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected doClassValidation_(opt_newValue?: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_newValue | any | <i>(Optional)</i> The input value.  A valid string, or null if invalid. |
